{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=TG3462 |revision=(S/CE) |asin= |series=AC4800 |fcc_date=12/12/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |availability=now |type=wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway |fcc_id=UIDTG3482ER |pwr_v=115 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=C7P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=60 |cpu1_brand=Intel Puma |cpu1_model=FHCE2712;Puma 7; |cpu1_cspeed=2 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Quantenna |cpu2_model=QT10GU |cpu2_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu2_cores=2 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML04G200TFI00 |fla2=128 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model= |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |ram1_num=4 |ram2=256 |ram2_brand=Nanya |ram2_model=NT5CC64M16GP-EK |ram2_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT10GU |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT7810C |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=8 |wi1_rxchains=8 |wi1_sstreams=8 |wi2_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi2_chip1_model=QT10GU |wi2_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi2_chip2_model=QT6210B |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=DOCSIS 3.1, MoCA 2.0, ZigBee, Thread, Bluetooth LE, battery backup, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=F8:A0:97 |oui_eth=F8:A0:97 }} {{TagLine|Cable Voice Gateway}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.arris.com/products/touchstone-tg3462-cable-voice-gateway/}} {{•}} [https://www.arris.com/globalassets/resources/data-sheets/touchston-tg3462-data-sheet.pdf Datasheet]
2x 192MHz OFDM in the downstream and 2x 96MHz OFDMA :in the upstream along with 32x8 channel bonding.<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=32 |up_c=8 }}
"Multi Processor Technology with ARM and ATOM based Application Processor"
===Variants=== *'''TG3462''' - DOCSIS 3.1 Telephony Gateway for North America :(DOCSIS 3.0 32x8, 8x8 802.11ac Wave 2 MU-MIMO) *'''TG3462S/CE''' - DOCSIS 3.1 Telephony Gateway for Europe :(EuroDOCSIS3.0 32x8, 4x4 802.11ac Wave 2 MU-MIMO)
===See also=== [[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] • [http://www.arris.com/products/docsis-3.1-broadband-devices/ DOCSIS 3.1 Broadband Devices] *[[Arris TG3442]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi *[[Arris TG3452]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi & MoCA 2.0 *[[Arris TG3462]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 8x8 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Zigbee & BT *[[Arris TG3482ER]] - ''Touchstone Wireless Telephony Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 8x8 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Zigbee & BT<!-- Same specs, may be the same device --> *[[Arris DG3450]] - ''Touchstone Cable Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi & MoCA 2.0
